column5: i've read some really good things about this line and the price is much lower than fireline. any experience out there? i see that you can get it from cabelas.
love the stuff!!! have it on all my muskie rods. Won't switch to anything else
tech, i'm assuming that you use the original. from the tests i've read, the plus is not nearly as good. seems that in an effort to make the line thinner, they lost a lot of the abrasion resistance.

You may find yourself sacrificing casting distance in a comparison to some of the thinner lines. I feel that the original is indestructable but I can't cast it nearly as far. This is very durable line but at the same time is thick and somewhat more visible (to my eyes) than anything else I have spooled up. I like it and feel the durability and brute strength of the line outweigh the casting distance issue - I am keeping it spooled on my nicest muskie rig.lobo
